message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible opportunity to acquire a valuable product. I believe it would be a great fit for you, and I'm willing to make a one-time offer to make it happen. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $750,000. This is a competitive price, considering the product's worth $800,000 to you. I'm confident you'll find it a worthwhile investment. What do you think?
